comments_since_last_sample.body:
There is something in common where the messages of the Creator come to us
Bible
“But do not forget this one thing, dear friends: With the Lord a day is like a thousand years, and a thousand years are like a day. (The holy Bible, 2 Peter 3:8) Veda
“Three-lokiah — three worlds; iuga - four yugas; sahasram - one thousand; bahih — beyond; abrahmanah - up to Brahmaloka; dynam - makes a day; ... "(Srimad Bhagavatam, 3,11, t.22). Prabhupada 
“-lokyāḥ—of the three worlds; yuga—the four yugas; sāhasram—one thousand; bahiḥ—outside of; ābrahmaṇaḥ—up to Brahmaloka; dinam—is a day; ... "(Srimad Bhagavatam,.3,.11, t.22).
Koran
“5 He regulates the affair from the heaven to the earth; them shall it ascend to Him in a day the measure of which is a thousand years of what you count”  (Koran, Adoration).
